<h3 id="X2222">X(2222)&nbsp;=&nbsp;X(2)-ISOCONJUGATE OF X(654)</h3>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; a(a - b)(a - c)(a - b + c)(a + b - c)(a<sup>2</sup>
- b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> - ac)(a<sup>2</sup>
- c<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup> - ab) : :
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the excentral triangle in the plane of a triangle ABC.  Let<br>
A'' = X(110)-of-A'BC, and define B'' and C'' cyclically<br>
(Oa) = circle with diameter AA'', and define (Ob) and (Oc) cyclically<br>
</p>
<p>
The circles (Oa), (Ob), (Oc), and the circumcircle concur in X(2222).
See <a href="http://www.hyacinthos.epizy.com/message.php?msg=24369"> <b>Hyacinthos 24369</b></a>.  (Antreas Hatzipolakis and Angel Montesdeoca, July 12, 2016)
</p>
<p>
X(2222) lies on the circumcircle, the cubic K230, and these lines: {1,953}, {3,2716}, {4,13999}, {5,37806}, {11,37815}, {12,3109}, {35,2687}, {36,80}, {40,2745}, {46,43078}, {55,2717}, {56,2718}, {57,840}, {59,110}, {74,484}, {98,5143}, {99,4998}, {100,522}, {101,650}, {102,517}, {103,1155}, {105,2006}, {108,7649}, {109,513}, {112,7115}, {162,933}, {163,35307}, {171,2699}, {200,2750}, {226,34309}, {243,917}, {477,22342}, {651,4588}, {661,2149}, {664,13396}, {675,1447}, {741,5061}, {759,859}, {789,46405}, {833,14594}, {842,16577}, {910,2161}, {915,1785}, {919,1024}, {931,47318}, {934,3676}, {972,5537}, {999,34232}, {1018,29127}, {1026,29241}, {1141,2166}, {1295,2077}, {1298,1956}, {1308,2283}, {1309,4242}, {1311,18359}, {1331,34151}, {1376,2751}, {1415,29044}, {1420,43081}, {1477,3660}, {1618,15439}, {1708,29242}, {1793,5080}, {1825,32710}, {2249,2341}, {2365,17615}, {2370,10538}, {2599,14979}, {2720,45884}, {2725,51682}, {2726,14628}, {2733,11500}, {2734,6796}, {2739,7580}, {2743,23832}, {2747,5285}, {2756,5687}, {2757,25440}, {3245,28159}, {3259,52242}, {3295,39546}, {3576,15737}, {3724,19628}, {3738,35011}, {3799,29157}, {3939,15632}, {4552,9070}, {5048,28235}, {5089,9085}, {5091,12032}, {5122,28193}, {5126,28233}, {5131,28173}, {5137,29015}, {5183,28163}, {5193,8686}, {6011,23067}, {6075,20999}, {6516,46962}, {7012,37964}, {8648,23592}, {8707,36804}, {8750,36076}, {9058,40576}, {9436,43363}, {9590,10260}, {11491,31866}, {11499,18339}, {13587,36590}, {13756,38504}, {14127,44979}, {14733,35348}, {15608,50933}, {21741,32730}, {23706,36067}, {23981,35013}, {26703,50366}, {26707,51751}, {28471,34857}, {32692,36145}, {32706,45766}, {32726,52431}, {35445,43080}, {36098,37140}, {36127,52775}, {36146,43050}, {37168,37799}, {37541,38530}, {37579,38938}, {40131,43079}, {41345,45926}
</p>
<p>
X(2222) = midpoint of X(484) and X(3465)<br>
X(2222) = reflection of X(2716) in X(3)<br>
X(2222) = isogonal conjugate of X(3738)<br>
X(2222) = cevapoint of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): (6,8648), (513,1319), (661,3724), (663,2183)<br>
X(2222) = X(i) cross conjugate of X(j) for these {i, j}: {6, 23592}, {661, 34535}, {1324, 15386}, {1411, 52377}, {1635, 57}, {1769, 1}, {2173, 7128}, {3724, 2149}, {5172, 59}, {8648, 6}, {19297, 1262}, {20989, 7115}, {23981, 109}, {35013, 2716}, {39200, 58}, {42741, 18772}, {46393, 52212}<br>
X(2222) = inverse-in-Stevanovic-circle of X(101)<br>
X(2222) = trilinear pole of the line X(6)X(1411)<br>
X(2222) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {59, 14513, 4551}, {10016, 10017, 2716}, {23703, 37630, 52377}<br>
X(2222) = concurrence of reflections in sides of ABC of line X(4)X(80)<br>
X(2222) = &Psi;(X(1), X(5))<br>
X(2222) = &Psi;(X(4), X(80))<br>
X(2222) = &Lambda;(X(80), X(3762))<br>
X(2222) = reflection of X(109) in line X(1)X(3)<br>
X(2222) = trilinear product of circumcircle intercepts of line X(1)X(5)<br>
X(2222) = X(i)-isoconjugate-of-X(j) for these {i, j}: {1, 3738}, {2, 654}, {3, 44428}, {6, 3904}, {9, 3960}, {36, 522}, {54, 6369}, {55, 4453}, {60, 6370}, {75, 8648}, {214, 23838}, {261, 42666}, {284, 4707}, {312, 21758}, {318, 22379}, {320, 663}, {333, 21828}, {513, 4511}, {514, 2323}, {521, 1870}, {526, 3615}, {649, 32851}, {650, 3218}, {652, 17923}, {655, 35128}, {656, 17515}, {657, 17078}, {693, 2361}, {758, 3737}, {860, 23189}, {1021, 18593}, {1098, 51645}, {1443, 3900}, {1459, 5081}, {1464, 7253}, {1577, 4282}, {1639, 40215}, {1845, 37628}, {1983, 4858}, {2167, 2600}, {2170, 4585}, {2185, 2610}, {2245, 4560}, {2364, 23884}, {3025, 51562}, {3063, 20924}, {3064, 22128}, {3261, 52426}, {3724, 18155}, {3936, 7252}, {3939, 4089}, {4025, 52427}, {4242, 7004}, {4391, 7113}, {4397, 52440}, {4564, 46384}, {4768, 16944}, {4895, 52553}, {6332, 52413}, {21012, 39178}, {21789, 41804}, {32641, 46398}, {34586, 43728}, {35011, 45950}, {35519, 52434}, {44426, 52407}<br>
X(2222) = X(i)-Dao conjugate of X(j) for these {i, j}: {3, 3738}, {9, 3904}, {206, 8648}, {223, 4453}, {478, 3960}, {5375, 32851}, {10001, 20924}, {15267, 51645}, {15898, 522}, {32664, 654}, {36103, 44428}, {36909, 4397}, {38979, 51402}, {39026, 4511}, {40588, 2600}, {40590, 4707}, {40596, 17515}, {40617, 4089}<br>
X(2222) = X(i)-Ceva conjugate of X(j) for these {i, j}: {23592, 6}, {46649, 14584}, {52377, 1411}<br>
X(2222) = barycentric product X(i)*X(j) for these (i, j): {1, 655}, {6, 35174}, {12, 37140}, {31, 46405}, {56, 36804}, {57, 51562}, {65, 47318}, {75, 32675}, {80, 651}, {100, 2006}, {101, 18815}, {108, 52351}, {109, 18359}, {190, 1411}, {476, 16577}, {514, 52377}, {648, 52391}, {653, 1807}, {658, 52371}, {662, 52383}, {664, 2161}, {759, 4552}, {901, 14628}, {934, 36910}, {1020, 6740}, {1262, 52356}, {1415, 20566}, {1461, 52409}, {1783, 52392}, {1793, 52607}, {2341, 4566}, {2594, 32680}, {3257, 14584}, {3738, 23592}, {3960, 46649}, {4551, 24624}, {4554, 6187}, {4559, 14616}, {4565, 15065}, {4573, 34857}, {4605, 52380}, {6358, 36069}, {14213, 36078}, {18026, 52431}, {21741, 35139}, {22342, 46456}, {24029, 40437}, {26700, 41226}, {32671, 34388}, {32678, 40999}, {34242, 44765}, {35307, 39277}, {36037, 52212}, {37222, 37630}<br>
X(2222) = barycentric quotient X(i)*X(j) for these (i, j): {1, 3904}, {6, 3738}, {19, 44428}, {31, 654}, {32, 8648}, {51, 2600}, {56, 3960}, {57, 4453}, {59, 4585}, {65, 4707}, {80, 4391}, {100, 32851}, {101, 4511}, {108, 17923}, {109, 3218}, {112, 17515}, {181, 2610}, {651, 320}, {655, 75}, {664, 20924}, {692, 2323}, {759, 4560}, {934, 17078}, {1020, 41804}, {1397, 21758}, {1402, 21828}, {1411, 514}, {1415, 36}, {1461, 1443}, {1576, 4282}, {1635, 51402}, {1769, 46398}, {1783, 5081}, {1793, 15411}, {1807, 6332}, {1825, 44427}, {1953, 6369}, {1983, 4996}, {2006, 693}, {2099, 23884}, {2161, 522}, {2171, 6370}, {2341, 7253}, {2425, 11700}, {2594, 32679}, {2599, 41078}, {3271, 46384}, {3669, 4089}, {4551, 3936}, {4552, 35550}, {4554, 40075}, {4559, 758}, {6187, 650}, {7115, 4242}, {8648, 35128}, {14584, 3762}, {16577, 3268}, {18359, 35519}, {18815, 3261}, {19604, 27836}, {21741, 526}, {21758, 3025}, {22342, 8552}, {23592, 35174}, {23703, 51583}, {23981, 16586}, {24624, 18155}, {32660, 52407}, {32662, 1789}, {32671, 60}, {32674, 1870}, {32675, 1}, {32678, 3615}, {32739, 2361}, {34079, 3737}, {34857, 3700}, {35174, 76}, {36059, 22128}, {36069, 2185}, {36074, 4880}, {36075, 4973}, {36078, 2167}, {36804, 3596}, {36910, 4397}, {37140, 261}, {37630, 30566}, {40172, 1639}, {46405, 561}, {46649, 36804}, {47318, 314}, {51562, 312}, {52212, 36038}, {52351, 35518}, {52356, 23978}, {52371, 3239}, {52383, 1577}, {52391, 525}, {52392, 15413}, {52409, 52622}, {52411, 22379}, {52431, 521}
</p>
